result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael A. GADZINSKI

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
At 9:34 a.m., the defendant failed to appear for a plea date.  State requests warrant.  Court authorizes warrant.
At 9:58 a.m., the case is recalled.  Defendant is now present.
State moves to dismiss and read in all counts.  The defendant plead to charges in 14 CF 467 and 15 CF 105.  Motion granted.
$250.00 cash bail transferred to 15 CF 105 and applied to court costs.
Minutes.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Plea hearing is set for 07-20-15 at 9:30 a.m.

Settlement conference with District Attorney reset to 05-05-2015 @ 3:45 p.m.
Rescheduled from 04-09-2015.
Status conference set for 04-09-2015 @ 3:00 p.m. BR-1.
Settlement conference with District Attorney reset to 03-27-15 at 10:45 a.m.

Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 02-12-15 at 2:45 p.m.  
Minutes.
Arraignment set for 01-12-2015 at 3:30 p.m., Br. 1.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Michael A. GADZINSKI
Current: 721 St. Clair Avenue, Sheboygan, WI 53081 United States  (Effective: 12-19-2014)
Prior: 2415 16th Street, Two Rivers, WI 54241
Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.  
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.  
Minutes.
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing and waives the statutory time within which a preliminary hearing must be held.  Preliminary hearing is set for 12-19-14 at 3:15 p.m.   Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of possess THC and bail jumping .  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 11-10-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $$250.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, that he maintain absolute sobriety and have no contact with Collin Bastian, Blake Bastian, Christopher Scott and Richard Douglas.  Bail is furnished and the defendant is released from custody.
Probable Cause Statement of Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
